description:
Forty years of a sheep Games has just come to an end, Pleasant Goat and other sheep sheep clan is still intoxicated in the joy of victory. The rest of the sheep of all the major clans are not willing to do so, and they secretly practise hard in the competitive events, and the result is a great achievement. However, the forty years of remote period tormented all the big clans of sheep. Therefore, all the sheep join hands to propose to the patriarch to hold a new sheep games immediately. Athletic League" staged the alliance of sheep of all clans, to the Weslie and other small sheep again to the athletic war book.
source: bgm.tv/deepl

OTHER: 33:喜羊羊与灰太狼之竞技大联盟

titles.title: Xi Yang Yang Yu Hui Tailang: Jingji Da Lianmeng
喜羊羊與灰太狼之競技大聯盟
